exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros x y z. split. - intros H. split. + apply Rlt_minus_r with z. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. apply H. + apply Rlt_minus_l with z. rewrite Rabs_minus_sym. apply H. - intros [H1 H2]. apply Rabs_lt_between. split. + apply Rlt_minus_l with z. apply H1. + apply Rlt_minus_r with z. apply H2.
